text: how do you build a secure
high-performing resilient and efficient
infrastructure for your applications and
your workloads
you build it with a well-trained team
our architecting on aws course covers
the fundamentals of building it
infrastructure the course is ideal for
solution architects that want to learn
how to optimize the use of the aws cloud
by understanding aws services and how
these services fit together into
cloud-based solutions
students can take that understanding
further through classroom training
because as aws instructors we have our
finger on the aws pulse we have unique
insights into services that others
couldn't possibly have and we have
access to the builders who build those
services
for example i had instructed a class and
i had a student email me with a couple
of questions the day after
they had asked for additional training
materials and practice exams and i was
able to give this student the
information they were looking for right
away a few months later though the same
student reached out to me regarding
performing a feasibility study on
setting up and running a specific
application on aws
i was able to connect that student with
the right contacts at aws to continue
the conversation this interaction that
started in the classroom led to future
engagements to help that student's
organization realize their cloud
capability
because of that micro moment that took
place in the classroom a student was
able to take an organization from what
is feasible to understanding aws
capabilities and what would be possible
to grow their footprint with a cloud
strategy
